original_text: A teacher of God's Law stood up. He wanted to see how Jesus would answer his question. So he asked Jesus, ‘Teacher, what must I do so that I can live with God for ever?’
korean_text: 어떤 율법교사가 일어나 예수를 시험하여 이르되 선생님 내가 무엇을 하여야 영생을 얻으리이까

sentences.original_text: A teacher of God's Law stood up
He wanted to see how Jesus would answer
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수가 어떻게 대답할지 보고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: He wanted to see his question
so that I can live with God for ever?'
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 영원히 하나님과 함께 살 수 있습니까?'
